definition: to cup one's hands in salute/to surround/to arch/to dig earth with the snout/arched

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: The main arch's main hole and the both sides abdomen arch the eyelet is 20 red stone arches juxtaposes becomes.
sentences.chinese: 主拱的主孔和雙方的腹拱洞裏形成並排20紅石拱門。

sentences.english: Black vines crept in and out of windows, through doors and over archways, up the sides of high stone walls.
sentences.chinese: 黑疼爬滿了窗戶，門和拱門，爬上石牆的兩側。
那是有葉形飾物之拱門。

sentences.english: The porch opens out onto the Kidron valley through three curved archways .
sentences.chinese: 門廊外側透過三個拱門向著克德隆溪谷。

sentences.english: The detective detected that the arch was under the marching Arctic architects’ protection.
sentences.chinese: 偵察察覺拱門受到行進的北極建築師們的保護。

sentences.english: There is an archway on the way to the airport.
sentences.chinese: 在通往機場的路上有一座拱門。

sentences.english: Theatrical lights give the surface of the Gateway Arch a night sheen.
sentences.chinese: 舞臺燈光讓大拱門的表面在夜間發出異樣的光芒。

sentences.english: Garlands of fruit and leaves wind along the lower arches.
sentences.chinese: 水果和樹葉的花環纏繞在低矮的拱門上。

sentences.english: Through this arch you walked straight into the gardens of Audley Court.
sentences.chinese: 穿過拱門，你就直接走進了奧德利莊院的園子。

sentences.english: The boy walks through the undecorated arch.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩走過未經裝飾的拱門。

sentences.english: Sell inflatable arch, model, bouncer, slide, castle, cartoon toy.
sentences.chinese: 銷售充氣拱門，模型，保鏢，滑梯，城堡，卡通玩具。

sentences.english: Dinin took a deep breath and gingerly stepped to the archway.
sentences.chinese: 狄寧深吸一口氣，小心翼翼地踏進拱門。

sentences.english: The Stone Arch marks the beginning of the Sacred Way to the Tombs.
sentences.chinese: 那個石拱門標誌着通往陵墓的神道的開始。

sentences.english: Many stone bridges and arches in the city were built during the Ming and Qing dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 在明和清王朝時期修建了許多城市的石拱橋和拱門。

sentences.english: The most recognizable aspect of a U. S. military wedding is the crossing of the swords, or sabers .
sentences.chinese: 美國軍事婚禮習俗中最值得提及的是軍刀拱門。

sentences.english: An artificial archway connected it with the grotto, to which a stairway of a dozen steps led down.
sentences.chinese: 以人造拱門十二個階梯往下連接穴洞。

definition: promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
bend in a street/corner/to turn a corner
flight of steps/(fig.) a means of advancement/stepping stone
